title: Power of Four
description: Given an integer n, return true if it is a power of four. Otherwise, return false. An integer n is a power of four, if there exists an integer x such that n == 4x.   Example 1: Input: n = 16 Output: true Example 2: Input: n = 5 Output: false Example 3: Input: n = 1 Output: true   Constraints: -231 <= n <= 231 - 1   Follow up: Could you solve it without loops/recursion?
